text: Shama High School is a coeducational senior high school at Shama in the Shama District of the Western Region of Ghana. ==History== The School was founded in 1990 as a result of the 1988 Educational Reforms in the Shama District Assembly. ==Notable alumni== *Reuben Griffiths Bekoe, volunteer *Bright Amanful ==References== Category:High schools in Ghana Category:Education in the Western Region (Ghana) Category:Educational institutions established in 1990 Category:1990 establishments in Ghana
title: Shama Senior High School
